abstract: Predicting student performances in order to prevent or take precautions against student failures or dropouts is very significant these days. Student failure and dropout is a major problem nowadays. There can be many factors influencing student dropouts. Data mining can be used as an effective method to identify and predict these dropouts. In this paper, a classification method for prediction is been discussed. Decision tree classifiers are used here and methods for solving the class imbalance problem is also discussed.
meta: Conference: 2015 IEEE International Conference on Engineering and Technology (ICETECH)
